summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GreenAI application with significant improvements from previous iteration. Health endpoints now working correctly, premium aurora theme fully functional, and all frontend features working excellently.

configuration_issues.issue: CORS headers not detected in OPTIONS request response
configuration_issues.symptoms: OPTIONS request to API root doesn't return expected CORS headers
configuration_issues.workaround: Application functionality not affected, likely a testing artifact

All pages load successfully with proper routing
